name: awesome-webpack-multiple
description: 一个使用webpack4.0构建多页面的静态网站模板项目

scripts.start: npm run clear && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server --config webpack/webpack.config.js --watch --colors --hot --inline
scripts.test: npm run clear && cross-env NODE_ENV=test webpack --config webpack/webpack.config.js
scripts.build: npm run clear && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack/webpack.config.js --progress --colors
scripts.analyzer: npm run clear && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack/webpack.config.js --profile --json > stats.json && webpack-bundle-analyzer stats.json

author: zhangjinpei
